alert.note: Alert for Gila River Valley; Parker Valley (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Hard Freeze Warning issued January 07 at 9:55PM MST until January 09 at 9:00AM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...HARD FREEZE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 1 AM TO 9 AM MST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Temperatures in the upper 20s to lower 30s expected. * WHERE...Parker Valley and Gila River Valley. * WHEN...From 1 AM to 9 AM MST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.
